issue_title: Users at Bengaluru Lab cannot connect to Teams: high CPU
remediation: Validate scope: reproduce the issue described as 'Users at Bengaluru Lab cannot connect to Teams: high CPU'. Gather diagnostics (logs, event traces, NetMon/PCAP) on Oracle-FIN-AP and impacted clients. Identify blast radius by checking recent changes (patches, policy updates, cert renewals). Tune policy scope; add detection exception by hash/path; force agent sync and verify signatures. Apply targeted fix and document exact commands/GUI steps. Verify resolution with the requester; monitor for 24 hours; create problem record if it recurs.
summary: Users at Bengaluru Lab cannot connect to Teams: high CPU. Likely cause: expired certificate. Verified with logs; resolved via targeted configuration correction and validation tests.

Gather diagnostics (logs, event traces, NetMon/PCAP) on Email-Exchange-77 and impacted clients. Identify blast radius by checking recent changes (patches, policy updates, cert renewals). Coordinate maintenance window; apply vendor firmware; validate PLC/SCADA comms with loopback tests. Apply targeted fix and document exact commands/GUI steps. Verify resolution with the requester; monitor for 24 hours; create problem record if it recurs.
summary: SharePoint permissions drift on Edge-Switch-113 leads to expired cert. Likely cause: missing group membership. Verified with logs; resolved via targeted configuration correction and validation tests.

Gather diagnostics (logs, event traces, NetMon/PCAP) on OneDrive-User-75 and impacted clients. Identify blast radius by checking recent changes (patches, policy updates, cert renewals). Correct permissions/connectors; reindex search; clear client cache and reauthenticate. Apply targeted fix and document exact commands/GUI steps. Verify resolution with the requester; monitor for 24 hours; create problem record if it recurs.
summary: SharePoint permissions drift on Azure-Storage-6 leads to access denied. Likely cause: token cache corruption. Verified with logs; resolved via targeted configuration correction and validation tests.
